title: Facebook usage reach in the United States 2019 , by gender
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Women and lowest at Response Men.
The Share of respondents of Response Women is 1.19% larger than the minimum value at Men.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Women has the highest Share of respondents and Men has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Women and lowest at Response Men.
The Share of respondents of Response Women is 1.19% larger than the minimum value at Men.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 2 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Women and lowest at Response Men.
There is a difference of 12.0 between the maximum Response Women and minimum Response Men.
The highest value 75.0 at Women is almost 1.09 times larger than the average value 69.0.
